pfunc_expr_unrecognised_word: Eror de espression: Parola"$1" minga reconossuda.
pfunc_expr_unexpected_operator: Eror ind l'espression: operador $1 minga spetad.
pfunc_expr_missing_operand: Eror ind l'espression: a gh'è nò l'operand per $1.
pfunc_expr_unrecognised_punctuation: Eror ind l'espression: carater de pontesgiadura "$1" minga reconossud.
